title: Episode 347 - But He's Killed Hundreds Of People!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down for a one on one with Black Rifle Coffee marketing VP and DB Sports Companion co-host Dan Hollaway to talk about his military career, address where the rumor of him killing hundreds of people came from, and chat about how taking ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down for a one on one with Black Rifle Coffee marketing VP and DB Sports Companion co-host Dan Hollaway to talk about his military career, address where the rumor of him killing hundreds of people came from, and chat about how taking LSD helped him overcome a social anxiety disorder. Great episode.
